downloadDescription: Azure Kinect Body Tracking SDK is an SDK for tracking bodies from your Azure Kinect DK device.
detailsSection:
Azure Kinect Body Tracking SDK is an SDK for tracking bodies from your Azure Kinect DK device.
For more information see https://Azure.com/Kinect
systemRequirementsSection:
Body Tracking SDK is available for the Windows API (Win32) for native C/C++ Windows applications and is not currently available to UWP applications. Azure Kinect DK is not supported for Windows 10 in S mode.
For more information see https://Azure.com/Kinect
installInstructionSection: Run the installer. More details are available at https://aka.ms/kinectdocs.
